<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.change_management.state_model" name="Change Management - State Model" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="CSHelp:State-Model-And-Transitions" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true" licensable="true">

</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides a new state model for Normal, Emergency and Standard change requests. Activating will replace the current state model and workflows.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:State-Model-And-Transitions</help> <id>com.snc.change_management.state_model</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Change Management - State Model</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.change_management.state_model/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.change_management,com.snc.process_flow_formatter</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>nc.change_management.state_model</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
